mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A synopsis of the genus Hydriastele (Arecaceae)

synonymy.name: Nengella macrocarpa

synonymy.name: Gronophyllum leonardii
synonymy.author: Essig and B. E. Young
synonymy.bibref: Essig and B. E. Young, Principes 29: 134 (1985)
synonymy.type: Papua New Guinea, Western, Kubuna; Brass; 5631
synonymy.type_loc: Holotype A; isotypes BRI, BO, NY

synonymy.name: Nengella microcarpa
synonymy.author: (Burret) Burret
synonymy.type: Papua New Guinea, Central, Dieni; Brass; 3998
synonymy.type_loc: holotype B†; isotypes A, NY, BRI, BO

synonymy.name: Nengella rhomboidea
synonymy.author: Burret
synonymy.type: Papua New Guinea, Western, Palmer R.; Brass; 7201

div.p: Essig and Young (1985) accepted Gronophyllum leonardii, a nomen novum that they established to account for a name, Nengella brassii (Burret) Burret (syn. Leptophoenix brassii Burret), that could not be recombined in Gronophyllum due to a pre-existing publication of the name Gronophyllum brassii (Burret 1939). Having seen the type of Leptophoenix brassii, we are convinced that it falls within the wide range of variation that is encompassed by the complex species Hydriastele pinangoides, in particular in terms of leaf morphology, and we place it in synonymy accordingly.
